How the #RentReliefAct works: renters who spend more than 30% of their income on rent would be eligible for a federal tax credit. 

This means more money in your bank account and more money invested back into the economy.

One role that I’ve tried to play is be a conduit – is hear the concerns y’all are raising, and make sure your voices are heard in Washington, that the relevant federal officials are listening, are hearing, and are acting. --> https://www.cruz.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=3977 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DiqTGDvXsAAD60S.jpg
One of the problems with the bureaucracy of any big government agency is it tends to be slow, and often unable to hear what’s happening on the ground.

My office has been very intentional in our efforts to facilitate and expedite the recovery process. To try to be in direct touch with the county judges, with the mayors, to listen to the problems y’all are having on the ground as we rebuild.

But I also know that the men and women around this room, y’all have been working around the clock to rebuild. […] As horrific as the storm was, I have to tell you, I’ve never been prouder to be a Texan than in the days and weeks after the storm. --> https://www.cruz.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=3977

The whole state of Texas took a hard hit. But the men and women represented around this table – y’all got it front and center. There was enormous pain, enormous damage, enormous loss of property, loss of homes, loss of livelihood. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DiqSNvDXUAAI5lB.jpg

We know Trump is insecure and weak. He himself shows us every day. But why isn't the President of this country defending our diplomats and people more forcefully? 

The American people cannot afford the level of blackmail they are witnessing.
What must Trump owe Putin personally, politically or financially that he and Republicans in Washington refuse to #ProtectOurDemocracy and hold the thug accountable?

Before the press in Helsinki and millions from around the world watching, Trump failed to stand up to the man who attacked our American democracy. 

Now, he's inviting Putin to the land of the free and home of the brave *right before* the elections.

This should be a priority for all members of Congress.
